document.full_text: russian authorities battled a blaze raging through an arms depot on friday that halted oil pipeline flows from the country's top crude producer and forced tens of thousands to be moved out of the area.
document.title: russian arms depot fire halts oil pipeline flows
lines_and_colors: russian authorities battled a blaze raging through an arms depot on friday that halted oil pipeline flows from the country's top crude producer and forced tens of thousands to be moved out of the area.
